text: Jussi Ilmari Karvinen, better known as Jussifer, is a Finnish-American record producer, songwriter and musician. He has worked with Kelly Clarkson, Bebe Rexha, JoJo, Alma and Dinah Jane. He also penned a track for the Spanish animated film Klaus titled "Invisible", got him a nomination at the 34th Goya Awards. ==Production discography== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders"
